title: The Cambridge Encyclopedia of Language 3rd Third Edition
description:
Large filesize due to high quality setting so the details of the many illustrations can be seen.


Paperback: 524 pages
Publisher: Cambridge University Press; 3rd edition (July 26, 2010)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0521736501
ISBN-13: 978-0521736503
Product Dimensions: 8.6 x 1.4 x 10.9 inches
Shipping Weight: 4.6 pounds

This new, thoroughly revised edition of the acclaimed Cambridge Encyclopedia of Language incorporates the major developments in language study which have taken place since the mid 1990s. Two main new areas have been added: the rise of electronic communication in all its current forms from email to texting, and the crisis affecting the world's languages, of which half are thought to be so seriously endangered that they will die out this century. â€¢ All language statistics have been updated, and additional information provided about their linguistic affiliation â€¢ All topics involving technology have been revised to take account of recent developments, notably in phonetics, language disability, and computing â€¢ Maps have been revised to include new countries or country names â€¢ Special attention has been paid to fast-moving areas such as language teaching and learning â€¢ The text design has been completely updated with many new illustrations throughout
